backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine experience requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground application.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the ValentineProposal component in a full‑screen container.
frontend/src/components/ValentineProposa: Interactive Valentine proposal UI with Yes/No logic, evasive No button, progressive notes, and love letter reveal.
frontend/src/content/valentineCopy.ts: Centralized content including proposal text, confirmation message, initial notes, progressive notes, and full love letter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook that calculates new random safe positions and scale effects to make a button evade user interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, background gradients, and custom animation utilities for a pink romantic aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts App with global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors from CSS variables, extended theme options, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state and requirements for a romantic Valentine proposal page, including features, constraints, and design goals.
